name: Body Scrubber
description:
Description
You are a human in a newly dawned AGI era brought by quantum computing, and you must perform and show your worth to these superbeings to show your value in this new world being worth of existence. You assume you can demonstrate your uniqueness by showing your human mind's ability for visual and conceptual pattern recognition. But whether this is good enough to show your worth, or AGI simply sees pity in you when you do your monkey tricks (if they hold emotions such as sympathy) your future is still unknown.

This game was submitted to https://itch.io/jam/quantum-game-jam-2022.

Controls
WASD - Move
Space - Jump
E - Scrub

Song credit
https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/692510
